title: France: May Day tests Macron's reform mettle
text:
France: May Day tests Macron's reform mettle 12:23pm EDT - 01:49
Tens of thousands of people are attending a May Day march in Paris against a backdrop of industrial action and discontent stretching from students to the national SNCF railway company. As David Pollard reports, the anger over reforms is becoming a big problem for French President Emmanuel Macron. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Tens of thousands of people are attending a May Day march in Paris against a backdrop of industrial action and discontent stretching from students to the national SNCF railway company.
